1553322.title: The teacher

choices: Too late- she's off the seat! Hide!
15533221.content:
Your vision focused on the brown door, creaking open. A pounding sounded through your heart- instinctively, you scurried behind a discarded beer can. To think, the simple act of opening a door could cause such a loud noise at this height...

As the door finally shut, you ducked back. You couldn't bear to watch. Footsteps shook the floorboards, like a great monster had entered. Even the can seemed to tremble. It was weird. You could've sworn you'd seen this room before- a simple mattress, a prominently-displayed computer- but everything seem distorted and alien. The tower of video game cases looked like a skyscraper in the distance. A signed baseball bat hung on the wall looked like a whole building. Perhaps the most horrifying thing was the white sock that had been carelessly tossed behind you. It seemed like a cavernous tunnel, emanating a faint feminine odor. The grey outline of rounded toes and a heel did nothing to help. What kind of a horrific beast would be able to wear something like this?

"Aaaargh, what a day..."

That voice... Her. It was her sock. The profile flashed through your head: Nanako Kuroi. World History Teacher. Age 27.

Peeking out from behind the can, your eyes were met by faraway purple jeans. Craning your neck up, you could see a white shirt, with perky breasts peeking out on either side of a red tie. As you looked up further, you fell to your backside. An exhausted, green-eyed face glanced directly forward. A blonde ponytail stuck out behind her. She stretched, pulling her blue bow off in a single swift movement. It was like a glorious, hypnotizing transformation as acres and acres of her hair fell out behind her, lying loosely. It took a long moment to register how a human being could be so... big.

As she let out an ear-splitting yawn, you could see one of her canines poking out to the side. Smiling, Nanako called out: "Honeeeey, I'm home!"

The voice nearly sent you flying back. After a few minutes without a response, she rubbed her head, putting a hand to her hip. "Yeah, as if I'd ever have a husband. It felt nice to say that, though."

Once again, her feet crashed against the floor, shaking deep into your bones. She started pulling her shirt off- either out of terror or honesty, you ducked away. What to do? You could play it safe, and stay as far away from her as possible- but then, how could you possibly get back to normal height? Quietly taking another look, your eyes fell upon a gigantic bra lying on the ground- you turned back behind the beer can as quickly as you peeked out. The mental image of this titanic teacher in a state of undress... You couldn't tell if it made her seem more human, or more horrifying. You brushed the picture out of your mind quickly. This wasn't the time to be thinking about that!

The rustling of clothes stopped abruptly, replaced by the ominous footsteps once more. A cold breeze blew by you. Your curiosity took the best of you- moving away from your shelter, you saw Kuroi standing by an open refrigerator, fishing around it as she hummed the theme song of an old anime. She was wearing a casual black tank-top, leaving her arms completely bare. A pair of comfortable shorts complimented her backside- from this perspective, it look like a pair of mountains. Every time she moved, it would wiggle a little- you were almost disappointed that the length of her hair hid so much above that.

"Gonna need something strong..."

Idly, she raised a foot, scratching her tower-like leg. You could notice tiny beads of sweat dripping down it- and you remarked that Nanako had left her shoes and socks at the door. An ant scurried below, wandering towards the smell of food. Without warning, the teacher stopped her scratching. The insect instantly disappeared underneath her- and she didn't even notice. A shiver ran down you body.

Finally, the titanic woman pulled out a bottle of beer, and made her way to the computer. Her backside landed with a THUD on the seat. The crack of the opening beer can popped through your head for a moment, as she sipped messily from it. Nanako turned on the console, patting it with a grin.

"Ah, PC, my best friend. How have you been?" She put a hand to her bust, leaning towards the device. "I've had better. That Konata- always such a brat about everything. I don't mind so much that she falls asleep in class, disobeys orders, and barely studies... You know what REALLY ticks me off?" Her smile looked almost spiteful now. "She's gotten ALL the rare gear in the MMO, and ALREADY hit the level cap! I've barely even gotten into the metagame! And I know she did it just to mess with me, make me feel like an old behind-the-times loser! So, PC, I'm gonna need your help to give that punk a what-for!"

The monitor gave no reply. She sat, her left foot dangling back and forth below the seat. Moving from behind the beer can, you approached her as she gazed anxiously at the screen. You couldn't see any trances of the insect on her sole- she'd completely erased it from existence. It was almost hypnotic to look at the monolith swinging back and forth, the round, pink toes wiggling every now and again. It had been a long day at work, apparently- you could smell it. Suddenly, Nanako glanced down- you leaped behind the leg of her chair, hiding from her gaze. Flexing her foot, each toe leaning out as if grabbing around something, she reached down to draw some toejam out, her patience dropping quickly.

After a few seconds of stillness, Kuroi kicked the computer tower with enough strength to make a full-sized man unconscious. And at your size, that meant... You didn't want to think about it. She shouted out, shaking the system. "WORK, PC! The schools MAY have banned corporal punishment, but here, I answer to NO ONE! You are but a slave to my whims! I am the GODDESS of this apartment room!"

The last shout echoed for a moment. Authoritatively, she slammed her foot on the ground, right next to you. The resulting shock wave sent you flying into the air, crashing onto your back. The floor seemed to become a trampoline- you were surprised it could hold the weight. Pain and fear rushing through you, you could only gaze at the foot before you, every minute detail expanded dozens of times. The world still seemed to wobble around chaotically after the crash- you couldn't tell how much time was passing. Nanako's faint feminine odor, the largeness of her foot, and the heat emanating from it had conquered your senses. The computer responded to her attack with a beep, a whir from the fan, and an error screen on the monitor.

"Scheduled maintenance?" Biting her lip for a second, the woman far above clutched her beer bottle, swallowing more of the brew. "Some goddess I am..." She brushed her hair back, slouching in defeat. Her booming voice now became slurred with gentle sobs. "I just wanted... I just wanted to kill something to relieve my stress... Is that too much to ask? Izzit, huh? Is this truly what the s-state of the modern middle-income Japanese woman has been reduced to? Geez, none of this would be happening if I had a boyfriend 'r something."

Nanako's massive feet hung loose below the chair, unmoving besides the occasional fidget. This was your chance- you could grab the woman's attention. OR run to safety. Who knows what she could do in this state? Your tiny form might be less clear to her, and she could think you a giant bug. Or, she might be able to accept your size more easily, and help you out. Would that be taking advantage of her? Thoughts tumbled around your head...
15533221.title: Nanako, Titanic Teacher
